summary: A collection of Qt modal dialog components that enable users to configure and maintain the media library, including creating and editing tags and fields, managing file extensions, importing dropped resources, checking FFmpeg availability, and resolving duplicate or unlinked entries.
business_intent: Provide an intuitive graphical interface for administrators and endâ€‘users to manage metadata, tags, and file integrity within the application, ensuring consistent data, smooth import workflows, and easy resolution of common library issues.
